articles.description: India has commissioned a one-of-a-kind liquid-mirror telescope at Devasthal, atop a mountain in Uttarakhand's Himalayan range keep a watch on the overhead sky.

articles.title: 7 Singapore indie acts you've probably never heard of but should: Lullaboy, Whirring, Shazza and more - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Singapore has a thriving music scene, if the sheer number of new artistes we have releasing music is any evidence. In an attempt at sussing out the next big thing, CNA Lifestyle takes a look at some acts making waves.
